plugins.name: decision-matrix
plugins.description: Decision Matrix provides a structured framework for major decisions including weighted criteria scoring, sensitivity analysis, pros-cons analysis, risk assessment, and recommendation generation. Activates when user needs help with decisions, comparing options, evaluating alternatives, or analyzing trade-offs. Supports queries like 'help me decide', 'compare options', 'evaluate alternatives', 'analyze decision'.
